targets.rawSql:
select time,value as bedroom
from gases
where gas_type = 'CO2' and room = 'bedroom'

select time,value as bathroom
from gases
where gas_type = 'CO2' and room = 'bathroom'

select time,value as kitchen
from gases
where gas_type = 'CO2' and room = 'kitchen'

select time,value as living_room
from gases
where gas_type = 'CO2' and room = 'living room'

from gases
where gas_type = 'CO2' and room = 'garage'

from gases
where gas_type = 'CO2' and room = 'balcony'
